title: Zilean
body: Bring back old Zilean, if your going to make the bomb a skill shot at least increase the damage not decrease it. Zilean sucks so bad now, anybody that says different probably hasn't played him.

replies.body:
Zilean is literally unusable now. They took a mediocre champion and gutted him for no reason other than "his q was oppressive." So instead they make it impossible to land? They just about removed it from his kit. And that stun? Oh please. ROFL 

And now your W doesn't work on your ult - literally the ONLY decent part of his kit, and your slow also lasts less time. 

All because apparently (news to me) Zilean was super OP and in desperate need of balance. Is anyone else besides me really confused?

Well I main Zilean support. The bombs you throw just have to outplay your opponent. Think like your opponent, toss a few bombs to see their reactions. Even when you learn about their movements, slow them at lv 3 and then bomb them. Slowing then bombing them will really help you land the bombs. Even then Reviving an ally at lv 6 is a game changer. He is a walking, stronger GA for ANYONE. Carries, tanks, bruisers, himself. you name it.

Upvoted.
I was just about to make a similar reply.

NO POKE IN LANE NOW...how is that fun?  I think riot has ruined him for me.  Only fun style now is troll style where you play only for his slow and speed boost.  This type of champ is already out there.  Traditional support like taric or janna or soraka.  Zilean was different because he had great poke and potential for very good damage if you could position well and not get caught.  How is no poke fair?  How is can't play mid anymore fair?  Try dueling someone mid where you try to land two bombs in a row...ha.  Agree with the post.  Zilean is not fun now.  Boring support.  How can he compete on lockdown when he is not tanky?  So he is basically an ap lockdown mage that is squishy and has no reliable damage.  Who thought that shit up?

I get how ges zoning people out
it just makes me sad that one of my favorite champs wich i personaly loved has been changed to the point where hes not even close to the old zilean annymore
while the old zilean was perfectly playable against certain champs (skilshot champs)
{{champion:101}} i went mid lane vs this guy and there was just no stopping me...

My only gripe is that the stun is too clunky. You have to aim and throw a Q, then hit W then aim again and land another Q. During a teamfight when you also need to ult and slow enemies this is just too awkward. I like the idea and the mechanics behind the new kit but it feels like there needs some polishing to get the feel of his spells right.
Look, I don't know what planet you guys are playing on, but I'm playing him just fine in Plat 1.

I like the idea behind, but there are several problems with the new zilean
* His new skillshot is quite difficult, even in team fights is hard to use it effectively because when the bomb sticks to someone, the most probable thing that will happen is that they move out and your second bomb will go on someone else.
Now, you may say that I should use my slow on them first, but to do that you would have to get on range, which doesn't usually happen. What happens 90% of the time is that I have to speed up myself to get on range and trying to land the two bombs on the same champ. As I said, it's hard and a 1s stun is not so rewarding.

* His new passive is not so well planned in my opinion, as you could give 300 or barely 20 exp on someone and you don't have any way of knowing which of your mates is more profitable because ou don't know how much exp is left for them to get on the next level.

These are my thoughs so far. I've been playing with him a lot recently.
